title: S+ finally!
body:
Old school beta player here, back after taking like 8 years off. Lots has changed, love the new grading and honour system. 

Been trying for 3 days to get S+ and finally got one!

But one question though, is it reasonable to equate a grading with a rank? And if so, which one? Only level 12 still so no ranked games yet.

Gg no re.
